text: Boswellia socotrana is a species of plant in the Burseraceae family. It is endemic to Socotra, Yemen. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and subtropical or tropical dry shrubland. ==References== socotrana Category:Endemic flora of Socotra Category:Vulnerable flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Isaac Bayley Balfour
title: Boswellia socotrana
